short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replace tempting food with Donald Trump!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Are you a Muslim on your Ramadan Fast? Are you tired of seeing posts about food scattered all over your timelines and webpages, distracting and tempting you? Are you disgusted by all the nasty things Presumptive Republican Candidate Donald J. Trump has said about Muslims? 

Just install the extension and all mention of food and food-related temptations will be replaced with Donald Trump. 

If that doesn't take away your appetite, nothing will. 

Thanks Donald!
